text: Mokgweetsi Eric Keabetswe Masisi (born 21 July 1961) is a Botswana politician. He became the fifth President of Botswana in 2018. He has also became Minister of Education in 2014. He was Minister of Presidential Affairs and Public Administration from 2011 to 2014. He was first elected to Parliament in 2009. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Botswana Category:Vice presidents of Botswana Category:Recipients of the Order of the Rising Sun
title: Mokgweetsi Masisi
